title: 举报魔改神奇宝贝服务器
author: DUELIST
txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=733193&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D3%26searchoption%5B208%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D1.2%26searchoption%5B208%5D%5Btype%5D%3Dselect

根据介绍是1.7.10的翡翠2服务器，翡翠2属于魔改服务器。申请删除，谢谢。

replies.author: xu11xx
replies.txt_content: 6/1日统一处理 已经留有名单了
